ExampleDefinition.Title: Vertically Stacked Axes
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates overriding the LeftAxesPanel Template to create a true EEG style chart, where many traces are included on the same chart.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Vertically Stacked Axes</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates overriding the LeftAxesPanel Template to create a true EEG style chart, where many traces are included on the same chart.</Run> <Run FontSize="13">Axes are stacked vertically and traces are allowed to overlap each other on a single SciChartSurface.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag the Chart to zoom.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Double click to reset zoom.</Run>
